documents.t: Download the latest version of flawbot.zip. Extract downloaded file contents into a separate folder. Modify the included config.json file with your API tokens. Open the command prompt and start the bot by entering: dotnet FlawBOT.dll note In case of errors, install the .NET Core 7.0 Runtime for console apps.

The following is a list of modules included with the latest version of FlawBOT. Bot - Basic commands for interacting directly with the bot. Channel - Commands for viewing and managing server channels. Emoji - Create, update and view server emojis. Games - Call APIs related to Steam, Team Fortress 2 and Nintendo. Misc - Miscellenaous commands for doing math and viewing animals photos. Music - Have the bot play music in a voice channel. Role - Commands for managing server roles. Search - Call a variety of APIs like NASA, Reddit and IMDB. Server - Commands for managing the server. User - Commands for managing server users.

Clone or Download the source code. Open FlawBOT\src\FlawBOT.sln in Visual Studio. Modify the included config.json file with your API tokens. Build the project. dotnet clean -c Release dotnet restore dotnet build -c Release -f net7.0 dotnet publish -c Release -f net7.0 Update your Raspberry Pi to the latest version. sudo apt-get update -y sudo apt-get upgrade -y Copy the compiled FlawBOT files to the Raspberry Pi. Install .NET Core 7.0 runtime. curl -sSL https://dot.net/v1/dotnet-install.sh | bash /dev/stdin --channel Current echo 'export DOTNET_ROOT=$HOME/.dotnet' >> ~/.bashrc echo 'export PATH=$PATH:$HOME/.dotnet' >> ~/.bashrc source ~/.bashrc Navigate to where you've copied your FlawBOT files and start the bot. dotnet FlawBOT.dll

Lavalink is a standalone audio sending node. It's required to use FlawBOT's music commands. The latest version of Lavalink is included with FlawBOT, however it still needs to be configured and enabled. Open application.yml and change address to the IP of a machine you'll be running Lavalink from. server: # REST and WS server port: 2333 address: 192.168.2.38 Open config.json and change Address to match the address set in Step 1. Set Enabled to true. "Lavalink": { "Enabled": true, "Address": "192.168.2.38", "Port": 2333, "Password": "youshallnotpass" } Open the command prompt and start Lavalink by entering: java -jar Lavalink.jar note In case of errors, install the latest Java Development Kit.
Commands for directly interacting with FlawBOT. The prefixes are .bot and.flaw
Returns information about the current FlawBOT instance. .bot info
Kicks FlawBOT from the current server. Respond with yes when prompted. .bot leave
Pings the FlawBOT client. Other alias: pong .bot ping
Reports a problem with FlawBOT to the developer. Other alias: issue .bot report [Description of the problem, minimum 50 characters]
Owner Only. Changes FlawBOT's activity. Other alias: setactivity .bot activity Team Fortress 2
Owner Only. Changes FlawBOT's avatar. Other aliases: setavatar, pfp, photo .bot avatar [Image URL in JPG, PNG or IMG format]
Owner Only. Changes FlawBOT's current status to Online, Idle, DND or Offline. Other aliases: setstatus, state .bot status Idle
Owner Only. Changes FlawBOT's server username. Other aliases: setusername, name, setname, nickname, nick .sudo setname FlowBOT
Commands for managing server channels. The prefixes are .chn and.ch
Creates a new channel category. Other aliases: createcategory, newcategory .channel category Welcome
Removes last X number of messages from the current channel. Other alias: clear .channel clean 10
Deletes a server channel. If a channel is not specified, the current one is used. Other alias: remove .channel delete #text
Returns information on a given server channel. If a channel is not specified, the current one is used. .channel info #text
Removes server user's last X number of messages from the current channel. .channel purge @CriticalFlaw 10
Renames a server channel. Other alias: setname .channel rename #text newtext
Creates a new text channel. Other aliases: createtext, newtext .channel text texts
Changes the current channel's topic. Other alias: settopic .channel topic Watermelon picking
Creates a new voice channel. Other aliases: createvoice, newvoice .channel voice voices
Starts a Yay or Nay poll in the current channel. Other alias: poll .channel poll Am I correct?
Commands for managing server emojis. The prefixes are .emoji and.emote
Creates a new server emoji. Other aliases: new, add .emoji create homer [Image URL in JPG, PNG or IMG format]
Deletes a server emoji. The bot can only delete emojis it created. Other alias: remove .emoji delete :homer:
Renames a server emoji. Other aliases: edit, modify .emoji rename :homer: homey
Returns information on a given server emoji. .emoji info :homer:
Returns a list of server emojis. Other aliases: print, all .emoji list
Asks a magic 8-ball a question. Other aliases: 8, 8b, 8ball .ask Am I lucky?
Returns a random cat fact and photo. Other aliases: meow, catfact, randomcat .cat
Flips a coin. Other aliases: coin, flip .coinflip
Rolls a six-sided die. Other aliases: dice, roll, rolldice, die .diceroll
Returns a random dog photo. Other aliases: woof, bark, randomdog .dog
Says hello to another user to the server. Other aliases: hi, howdy .hello @CriticalFlaw
Repeats a message in text-to-speech. Other aliases: echo, repeat, say, talk .tts Hello World
Performs a basic math operation. Other alias: calculate .math 2 + 2
Calculates the total sum of all inputted values. Other alias: total .sum 2 5 3
Plays YouTube audio from your current voice channel. .play https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4JkIs37a2JE
Stops active audio playback and leaves the current voice channel. .stop
Sets audio playback volume between 0 and 100. .volume 50
Restarts the audio playback of the current track. .replay
Returns information on the currently playing track. .nowplaying
Returns information on a given Amiibo figurine. Other alias: amib .amiibo luigi
Returns information on a given Pokémon. Other aliases: poke, pk .pokemon pikachu
Returns information on a given speedrun game from Speedrun.com. Other aliases: game, run .speedrun Super Mario 64
Commands for calling the Reddit API for posts from various subreddits. The prefix is .reddit
Returns the hottest posts from a given subreddit. .reddit hot tf2
Returns the latest posts from a given subreddit. .reddit new tf2
Returns the top posts from a given subreddit. .reddit top tf2
Commands for managing server roles. The prefixes are .role and .roles
Changes the server role color in HEX format. Other aliases: setcolor, clr .role color #F2A92B
Creates a new server role. Other aliases: new, add .role create admin
Deletes a server role. Other alias: remove .role delete admin
Returns information on a given server role. .role info admin
Returns a list of server users with a given role. .role inrole admin
Toggles server role being mentionable by other users. .role mention admin
Removes a role from a server user. .role revoke @CriticalFlaw admin
Removes all roles from a server user. .role revokeall @CriticalFlaw
Assigns a role to a server user. Other alias: addrole .role setrole @CriticalFlaw admin
Toggles server role being visible to users. Other aliases: display, hide .role show admin
Returns an Urban Dictionary definition for a word or phrase. Other aliases: define, def, dic .dictionary Discord
Returns an image from Imgur. Other alias: image .imgur Cats
Returns NASA's Astronomy Picture of the Day. Other aliases: apod, space .nasa
Returns the news articles on a topic from NewsAPI.org. .news Nintendo
Returns information on a given movie or TV show from OMDB. Other aliases: imdb, movie .imdb Lego Movie
Returns the current time from a given location. Other alias: clock .time Moscow
Returns the current weather from a given location. .weather Ottawa
Returns a random Simpsons screenshot and its episode. Other alias: caramba, futurama .simpsons
Returns a random Simpsons gif. Other alias: doh, morbotron .frinkiac oi
Returns information on a given Twitch stream. .twitch shoutfactorytv
Returns articles on a given topic found on Wikipedia. .wiki Steam
Commands for managing server users. The prefixes are .server and .guild
Changes the server avatar. Other alias: setavatar .server avatar [Image URL in JPG, PNG or IMG format]
Returns information on the current Discord server. .server info
Returns an instant invite link to the server. .server invite
Removes users that have been inactive for X number of days from the server. .server prune 30
Changes the server name. Other alias: setname .server rename Cool Discord Server
Direct messages a server user with a warning. Other alias: scold .server warn @CriticalFlaw stop spamming!
Commands for calling APIs related to Team Fortress 2. The prefix is .tf2
Formats a server connection string into a clickable link. .tf2 connect 123.345.56.789:000; password hello
Returns the profile of a community creator. Other aliases: creators, youtuber .tf2 creator criticalflaw
Returns information on a given schema item. Other aliases: schema, hat .tf2 item natasha
Returns information on a given map. Other alias: maps .tf2 map pl_upward
Returns a list of news articles from teamwork.tf. .tf2 news
Returns a list of servers with a given gamemode. Other alias: servers .tf2 server payload
Commands for managing server users. The prefixes are .user, .users and .usr
Returns server user's profile picture. Other aliases: getavatar, image, pfp .user avatar @CriticalFlaw
Bans a server user. Optionally include a reason. .user ban @CriticalFlaw Spammer
Deafens a server user. Optionally include a reason. Other alias: deaf .user deafen @CriticalFlaw
Returns information on a given server user. Other aliases: poke, pk .user info @CriticalFlaw
Kicks a user from the server. Optionally include a reason. Other alias: remove .user kick @CriticalFlaw
Mutes a server user. Optionally include a reason. Other alias: silence .user mute @CriticalFlaw
Changes server user's nickname. Other aliases: setnick, nick .user nickname @CriticalFlaw critical
Returns permissions of a server user. .user perms @CriticalFlaw #text
Unbans a server user. Optionally include a reason. Only user's Discord ID is accepted. .user unban 1234567
Undeafens a server user. Optionally include a reason. Other alias: undeaf .user undeafen @CriticalFlaw
Unmutes a server user. Optionally include a reason. .user unmute @CriticalFlaw
Commands for calling the YouTube API for videos and playlists. The prefix is .youtube
Returns a list of YouTube channels. Other aliases: channels, chn .youtube channel pewdiepie
Returns a list of YouTube playlists. Other aliases: playlists, list .youtube playlist Let's Drown Out
Returns the first YouTube search result. Other aliases: find, watch .youtube search Accursed Farms
Returns a list of YouTube videos. Other aliases: videos, vid .youtube video Zero Punctuation
To get the most out of FlawBOT's commands, modify the included config.json file with below API tokens. Discord. Imgur. NASA. NewsAPI. OMDB. Pokemon. Steam. Teamwork.TF. Twitch. Weather. YouTube.
Commands for calling the Steam API for game and user information. The prefix is .steam
Returns information on a given Steam game. .steam game Team Fortress 2
Returns information on a given Steam user. Other alias: player .steam user criticalflaw
